title: Valerie June - Call Me A Fool (from #MicroShow performance)
description:
Valerie June performs the song "Call Me A Fool" from her 2021 record, "The Moon and Stars: Prescriptions for Dreamers," in a MicroShow performance for The Current recorded live at the Hook & Ladder Theater in Minneapolis on March 22, 2022. 

Watch the full MicroShow set:
https://www.thecurrent.org/feature/2022/05/16/valerie-june-performs-a-captivating-microshow-at-the-hook-ladder
